title: What is the purpose of the Victor's Emblem?

replies.body: You get the bragging right to say "I chose the winning side"
Not really.  Some people have chosen Order but Chaos is clearly winning.
The people who chose the losing side will get no bragging rights, of course. What's so hard to understand?

Q: Is there a reward for participating in the event? How do I get it?
A: Yes. There’s a mission called Force of Wills in your mission log that unlocks the Victor’s Emblem. You’ll need to complete any seven missions to get it, excluding In the beginning... The Victor’s Emblem will sit in your loot inventory until VS. is over. You will then need to craft it into an icon that celebrates the reigning side.

>You will then need to craft it into an icon that celebrates the reigning side

You only get the icon of the winning side. Seriously, it's not that hard to follow.

You guys  realize that I literally just copy pasted information from the VS riot page right?

Edit. 
Incase this is still unclear, you use the Victor's emblem in hextec crafting to unlock an icon at the end of this event. The icon will be for the side that wins, it does not matter WHO you supported, if you finish 7 missions during the event your able to craft this icon. that being said riot may be tricky and put an orb cost on it, but I doubt it as folks would get so tilted if their side won but they couldn't unlock the icon.

Your response to my post was to claim its not that hard to follow, which I do agree with but I must confess I don't get why you chose to quote me and follow up with "seriously, its not that hard to follow." To me this implies that there was some form of confusion with the sentence you quoted. Overall I do agree with you in that its pretty easy to understand so long as you have read the publically available website. Unfortunately from the number of posts on the boards not knowing what the emblem is for its clear that people don't know what's going on. I guess its my bad that I assumed you where confused and had the wrong idea about how this event functioned, but in my defense literally every thing you have posted in this thread was incorrect and/or off topic making me thing you had no idea wtf was going on.
